title: MOTOROLA ZX 107.6 cm (43 inch) Full HD LED Smart Android TV with Wireless Gamepad  (43SAFHDM)

product_specification.In The Box: Television Set 1N, Remote Control 1N, Wallmount Stand 1N, AAA Batteries 2N, Desktop Stand 2N, Stand Support Screws 4N, Quick Setup Guide 1N, Gaming Controller 1N, Power Cord 1N, AV Converting Cable 1N
product_specification.Processor: ARM CA53 Quad Core with TEE 1.1GHz
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Netflix, Prime Video, Hotstar, YouTube, Google suite of apps and others downloadable from Playstore etc.
product_specification.Other Internet Features: All features available with Official Android 9.0 TV
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Combi Remote (Bluetooth + Infrared) with Google Assistant; Netflix, Prime Video, Google Play, YouTube Hot Keys
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty is Non-transferrable, Valid Only in the Territory of India and Extended Only to the First End User Customer (Customer). Warranty will be Valid Only When the Original Purchase Invoice is Presented at the Time of Service. Warranty will Cover Only Functional Parts and Software Issues Having Manufacturing Defects and Does Not Cover Damages Resulting From Un-authorised Adaptations / Adjustments / Tampering of the Product, Improper Installation of the Product, Normal Wear and Tear Caused Due to Use of Product
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear Caused Due to Use of Product. Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories to the Product (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag Etc). All Plastic, Rubber, Glass, or Aesthetic Parts and Consumable Replacements will be on a Chargeable Basis. All Transportation and Handling Expenses Incurred While Replacing or Repairing Will be Payable by the Customer. Warranty Shall be Voids If: a) The Type or Serial No. On the Product has been Altered, Removed or Defaced.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.16 Million Colors + 8-bit Color Depth: With an extensive range of 16.7 million colors, get ready to enjoy incredible visual quality in 8-bit color depth. Also, this TV’s panel offers a 178-degree wide-angle viewing and exceptional color reproduction.
product_description.Super Bright Panel + High Luminance: This panel with high-luminance LEDs accurately adjusts the brightness in every pixel, bringing out the finer details to provide you with a truly mesmerizing viewing experience.

review: This 43" Full HD Motorola TV is a game-changer at the price point at which it comes. Because almost everything we expect from a TV in today's time, comes bundled with it. And what we don't expect, for example a wireless Game-pad, that too comes out of the box. With thin bezels, Dolby Audio, great quality front-firing 20 W sound bar, this TV ticks all the boxes. The remote also comes with Google Assistant button as well as dedicated buttons for Netflix and YouTube for an easy experience. The presence of Android 9.0 (with future updates) makes sure it won't go obsolete in near future.

Please avoid this tv,it may bundle many feature but the screen is really bad.
my point is tv fundamentally first should have good display please don't go behind the features.
I would recommend you to go with LG , Samsung or Sony .the smart feature can be brought with a steaming devices which could cost around 3000,
I was using a LG TV before I brought this ,within minutes with this tv I was able to identify the flaw display It wasn't any defect display itself is like that.
Even a SD channel used to look so good in my LG TV but even hd channel don't colour that well.
Screen is not bright, contrast ratio, sharpness and colour reproduction is bad and not accurate. Hence much of said parameters aren't mentioned any where.More over they have used cheap edge led method which means led backlight are present only at the edges resulting in permanent grayish shades at edges when on white screen.
Front firing sound bar is not as per they are advertising for 32 inch ,it's actually bottom facing two speaker. You cannot consider them as sound bar,they don't form a channel/chamber where sound resonate and that to it is made up of plastic doesn't have the that look asthenic wise as that you see in the adv pics.
My finally point is give most priority to display,things like speaker and any other smart feature can be addon at any point but display can't be done anything you have to bare with it please keep this on you mind.

everything is fine. this is a lovable machine.
if you are thinking about to buy a LED TV then you must read this review.
I love the brands like Motorola and nokia.flipcart delivered this tv on 7 December 2019.a nd installation and demo completed on 8 December. after using this one about 10 days, now I am writing review_ _ _
Good things- - -
(1) 20 watts box speaker are really a sound bar, this produce a great bass punch with melody of tweeter. you can't find such a wonderful sound under such a low price.

(2) IPS panel are great for tv viewing angle.
no matters where you sit or sleep in your room. you will found same image quality from all corners of your room. brightness is too much for day view.
contrast ratio is also great.
this tv is very good as compared to" MI TV 4A PRO" Or "MI TV 4C PRO".

(3) Android 9 pie is so smooth ,you will feel luxurious.

(4) 1 GHz quadcore cortex A53 processor is great , but i am feeling that it must be upgraded.
RAM capacity is enough.
game pad works perfectly via Bluetooth connection.
Asphalt nitro 8 game is fabulous.i enjoy this one.
internal memory is only 8 GB. but about 50% of internal memory is occupied by Android pie 9.so less memory remaining for users.
if you downloads more app then your tv android function will becomes slow.
so avoid download unwanted apps.



but my heart got broken when I know 2 major drawback.
(1) this TV is not manufacturing by Motorola itself. it is made by "SKYWORTH" which is a leading chinese LED TV manufacturer over the world.
we love "Motorola" not "skyworth",we purchase this tv in the name and fame of Motorola. but in really this is a chinese product.
(2) this tv is working only on pure sine wave inverter .so if your inverter produces pure sine wave then it is right choice. if you have square wave output then tv will not ON.

Very nice TV I loved it. I bought especially with the name tag which is Motorola and yes the name itself was the main reason to buy as Motorola entered in the world of television. I bought 43" led tv which is beautiful in looks and have a great screen view with picture clarity. However now there is no use of 4k as of now with this FHD is really lovely viewing experience. Second thing the game pad which is additional benefit that we can play games also when we get bored. I would say it is a perfect Smart TV with full Enternaintment 😍 I am just loving it 👏 Good job Motorola and Thank you so much Flipkart great job 👍 I am a new to flipkart hence it was my first order and yes it was a great experience with flipkart 👏 👍
Awesome tv with many features you can expect and mesmerising picture quality. The controller is smooth and food and fits perfectly in your hand.

Setup was a bit tedious and took some time to understand. Once this was done, it was in super flow. Dolby Sound is pretty good and much better than conventional televisions. Well done Flipkart and Motorola in getting this product to the market at a affordable pricing. Mission accomplished

Motorola 32" TV just bought 1 day. it's highly recommended. It's complete Android smart TV.
It's come with Metal frame , Android 9 with Google assistant, IPS panel , 8 bit colour depth, 3 core GPU, 4 core CPU 64 bit, 1 GB RAM & 8 GB ROM. ITS MOST UPDATE SMART TV COMPARE TO OTHERS 32" SMART TV IN THIS PRICE RANGE. PICTURE & SOUND QUALITY AWESOME but sound bass are low, for better bass you have to connect external woofer/speakers. PERFORMANCE IS GOOD. Only there have some connectivity issue as there have no Audio out jack available to connect external speakers/woofer however you can add/connect your external speakers/woofer via Bluetooth. 2 HDMI & 2 USB port available.

Regarding delivery & installation, thanks to flipkart for delivery within 1 day . Installation done on same day.

one negative point that is I just forgot to add complete TV protection of 3 year & unable to add right now after several call to flipkart customer care. it's worst policy, flipkart need to expedite & should have some alternative solution may be with some post facto approval / with some additional amount need to pay by customer ect.

Pros-
1. Picture quality is crisp & good
2. The bottom-firing speaker produces good amount of sound!
3. Connectivity is good. 2HDMI & 2USB in this price range is nice.
4. The android experience is really nice.
A Lot of people reported about connectivity issues but I didn't felt such till now. The first time it will take lot of time but after that no problem..
Cons-
1. Pen drive/ flash drive reading is a headache... There is no direct option for browsing. Always u have to rely on players.
2. Produces normal quality pictures with PS3 since HDR is not available.
3. Location of USB & HDMI ports is very cosy and in one side which is really a disguise..
4. The overall looks is very ordinary. May have been little bit smarter than the recent one...

in time delivery, same day installation and demo, happy with the product, go for it guys, over all very good smart tv, value for money, this is my first day review after using 6 hours..... thanks for flip kart and Motorola, and seller....

First of all delivery and installation was on time and satisfied, however installation guys had no knowledge on seting up TV, They just fixed..turned on and bye bye
1)Starting with the DISPLAY, its good to see when viewd from a distance, I have noticed that the brightness drops or there is a little bit of dark shade when viewed from extreme sides(colors are normal only brightness varies) but its not much issue. HD contents have very good clarity but dont expect that from normal SD quality channels, The colours are natural too.
2)When it comes to SOUND its pretty good, one thing to note is that the speakers are not front firing (32 inch model) but down firing, sounds are very loud but don't relate loudness with quality, quality is also good enough nothing to worrry about.
3)CONNECTIVITYis the one thing that I found a little bit low, The wifi gets disconnected some times and remote some times need 2 or 3 clicks to respond(not sure if its a perfomance issue), also it takes a bit to time to connect to bluetooth or wifi, overall conectivity is on a bit lower bound.
4)PERFOMANCE seems to be on a balance here, can't say its a well performer or it's a mediocre perfomance. Takes around 20secs to turn on, Didn't find any lags on gaming.
one dissapointment is that it cant play contents above 1080p in YouTube and also 4k content not playable from USB (tried mx player,it just plays,but not usable)
5)FEATURES : Please dont fall on gaming pad gimmik there is not much games to make use of, CHROMECAST is very slow and poor quality for me(dont know why,its totaly unusable),Remote mic is good enough,google assistant takes 2 sec to start hearing.
Apart from connectivity and chromecast issue everything is overall good

First of all, if you are going to rebrand a hardware at least have the courtesy of telling your customers what you are plainly. Embossing the Motorola logo on some third-party cheap Chinese product and dumping them on Diwali sale is not cool. Now the shortcomings.. 1. Sound quality is poor. In all the Cable, DTH, OTT Streaming services, talking voice is very low compared to back ground sounds and music. No matter what the equalizer setting is, your music volume is suddenly too high while the talking audio is too low completely off the balance. You constantly need to have the TV remote to adjust the sound volume. 2. The LCD looks very cheap when seen in different angles. You can almost see the rainbow effect, when there is a light source hitting the surface of the screen from a specific viewing angle. 3. The 1 GB RAM definitely proves this piece of hardware is not enough equipped for the year 2020. Forget playing any games or running any apps. You can install streaming apps though. I installed Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube, Sun NXT, Hotstar which all worked fine which is a relief. I didn't even get to connect the Game Controller due to Bluetooth issues. So that's all my review. Wouldn't recommend if you can go for better models.

Unbelievable ! I am writing this review after a week of usage.
Gamepad : superb built quality. I have a PS4 and I can say this game pad is nothing less than it. My rating :10/10
Display : Truly amazing and vivid colours reproduction on IPS panel. I have a 43 inch Sony tv and display quality is nothing less than it and that too in 14k. My rating : 9.5/10

Sound : Watched some movies and played games and music. Sound is good enough. Rating : 8.5/10.
Overall rating : 9.5/10. Go for it. Value for money product.

Writing this review after using for 7 days. I was very sceptical about buying this as I was not sure about which one to choose among MI, VU and Redmi. After checking a lot of video reviews on YouTube I decided to go with this one. The delivery was fast and on the same day evening installation was done. The build quality is good with very slim bezels and the picture quality is great for a HD Ready TV. The front speakers are loud enough and much louder than others. The stock android is awesome. If you have a WiFi bring it closer to the tv or else you will face connectivity issues. I had a very old router on the next room with thick walls so I had to buy a new dual band router. Now it's working like a charm. The gaming performance is good but don't keep very high hopes with the free gamepad. It's not that good. Feels cheap. But the TV is absolutely great. Go for it. Beats Redmi and Realme in terms of sound and picture quality.

However there is a slight struggle with finding the optimal setting ao that background sounds and music doesn't become too loud but dialogues are still audible. As for connectivity, no issues whatsoever. TV is located really far from wi-fi router and doesn't face any issues even with 2 closed doors in between. RAM management is good enough, apps don't lag. Response times aren't instantaneous but are good enough. All in all - great tv for the price.

Pros:
1. Good-sized (43") Android TV at a budget price. I got it at 20K.
2. Picture quality is good. The sound quality is okay.
3. The attached soundbar gives it a premium look.
Cons:
1. Soundbar doesn't produce good quality audio at high volumes. Volume beyond 30% is pointless as hardly any change can be heard after that.
2. Gamepad lags often and connectivity is a big problem.
3. Limited RAM and storage make it difficult to play even decent quality games, forget high quality.

Motorola could have done better, but I guess it had to cut some corners to sell at 20K price. I am really disappointed with the soundbar. I have a MI soundbar and it is exponentially better than the TV soundbar.

Picture: the picture quality is okay.

TV: the tv hangs a lot, there are many isntances where u have to restart the tv.

Remote: the remote has stopped working since a last few months. Earlier there was a lag in remote, as in if u press a button it takes lot of time for the tv to respond. Now the remote has stopped working completely.

I was using a Sony Bravia LCD TV with Google Chromecast before this. It offered much better user control on picture and voice quality.. Bought this one as an experiment only because it has a video game setup with wireless gamepad. This is the primary feature of this TV. My 9yrs old enjoy playing games on this TV. No problem with gaming as of now.
In terms of TV, it certainly lags behind Sony Bravia. While there are options to change video and audio quality according to user, but it's limited. Also, as an Android TV, it performs as expected, just that it sometimes gets disconnected from Wi-Fi without a reason and shows a lag on TV remote.
Also, one more LOW point is that the TV hangs at times and you have no option to switch it off directly from power source. As the remote stops working.
The TV definitely needs a lot of improvement, if Motorola wants it to be seen as more than a limited video game for kids.
This review is after more than a month of usage.

* Picture quality is good.
